def_en: A slave is someone who is the property of another person and has to work for that person.

def_cn: 完全被控制的人;完全被影响的人
def_en: You can describe someone as a slave when they are completely under the control of another person or of a powerful influence.
If you say that a person is slaving over something or is slaving for someone, you mean that they are working very hard.
